modName: Master trainers train you in skills beyond 90 upto level 100
summary: Removed the 90 skill cap on master trainers. They now train you up to level 100 in their respective skill expertise.
descriptionHtml:
Get trained from Master trainers beyond 90 upto level 100. 

Installation:
Same as always.
1) Extract the zip file into Skyrim/data directory.
2) In Skyrim Launcher, select data files, and check MasterTrainers100.esp
3) Enjoy.

Uninstallation
Just delete the MasterTrainers100.esp

PS: I tried to make the mod work in conjunction with the Community uncapper. Unfortunately, I am unable to set the Training limit value beyond 100 in the Skyrim Creation kit. Perhaps there\'s some way to mod the game outside SCK. 

If so, feel free to use the idea behind this mod. I\'d really love having trainers teach you upto level 300!
author: dagincourt88
